txt.en: Defeat Angmarim at Sagroth, Lair of Vermin
Many dangerous creatures have called the sewers of Carn Dûm home. Some have remained rumours, nothing more. Others, however, may be of interest to the scattered remnants of the Iron Crown.
Sagroth, Lair of Vermin -- Slayer of Angmarim
You have defeated countless Angmarim in the sewers of Carn Dûm. That, and the hostile creatures living in the sewers, should dissuade them from attempting anything further.
Many dangerous creatures have called the sewers of Carn Dûm home. Some have remained rumours, nothing more. Others, however, may be of interest to the scattered remnants of the Iron Crown.
